## ğŸ“Š Diagrams Rendering Tools

### Online Tools (à¹à¸™à¸°à¸™à¸³)
1. **Mermaid Live Editor** - https://mermaid.live/
   - Paste Mermaid code
   - Export PNG/SVG
   - à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸‡à¸²à¸™à¸‡à¹ˆà¸²à¸¢à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸ªà¸¸à¸”

2. **PlantUML Online** - http://www.plantuml.com/plantuml/
   - à¸ªà¸³à¸«à¸£à¸±à¸š advanced diagrams
   - Support many diagram types

### Desktop Tools
1. **Visual Studio Code** + Mermaid Extension
   - Install "Markdown Preview Mermaid Support"
   - Preview diagrams in VS Code

2. **Draw.io** (diagrams.net)
   - à¸ªà¸£à¹‰à¸²à¸‡ diagram à¸”à¹‰à¸§à¸¢ GUI
   - Export à¸«à¸¥à¸²à¸¢à¸£à¸¹à¸›à¹à¸šà¸š

### How to Render Mermaid Diagrams

**à¸§à¸´à¸˜à¸µà¸—à¸µà¹ˆ 1: Mermaid Live (à¸‡à¹ˆà¸²à¸¢à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸ªà¸¸à¸”)**
```bash
1. Go to: https://mermaid.live/
2. Paste Mermaid code from .md files
3. Click "Export" â†’ Choose PNG or SVG
4. Save image
5. Insert in presentation
```

**à¸§à¸´à¸˜à¸µà¸—à¸µà¹ˆ 2: VS Code**
```bash
1. Install extension: "Markdown Preview Mermaid Support"
2. Open .md file with diagram
3. Ctrl+Shift+V (Preview)
4. Right-click diagram â†’ Copy Image
5. Paste in presentation
```

## ğŸ¨ Presentation Tips

### à¹€à¸¥à¸·à¸­à¸ Slides à¸ªà¸³à¸„à¸±à¸ (à¸–à¹‰à¸²à¹€à¸§à¸¥à¸²à¸ˆà¸³à¸à¸±à¸”)
à¸«à¸²à¸à¸¡à¸µà¹€à¸§à¸¥à¸²à¸™à¹‰à¸­à¸¢ (10-15 à¸™à¸²à¸—à¸µ) à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¹€à¸¥à¸·à¸­à¸à¹€à¸‰à¸à¸²à¸°:

**Must-Have Slides (10 slides):**
1. Title
2. à¹‚à¸ˆà¸—à¸¢à¹Œà¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸£à¸±à¸š (Requirements)
3. System Architecture
4. Code Changes - User Model
5. Code Changes - Booking Controller
6. Use Case Diagram
7. Class Diagram
8. Sequence Diagram - Create Booking
9. Demo
10. Conclusion

### Design Suggestions
- **Color Scheme:** Blue (tech), Green (success), Red (errors)
- **Font:** Sans-serif (Helvetica, Arial, Calibri)
- **Code:** Monospace font (Consolas, Monaco)
- **Background:** White or light gray
- **Contrast:** High contrast for code blocks

### Code Display
- **Don't:** Show entire files
- **Do:** Show specific changes with highlighting
- **Format:** Use syntax highlighting
- **Size:** Font size 14-16pt minimum

---

## ğŸ“§ Example Slide Content

### Slide Example: Code Changes

**Title:** "Code Changes - User Model Enhancement"

**Layout:**
```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚  Code Changes - User Model             â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤
â”‚                                        â”‚
â”‚  BEFORE (Assignment 7)                 â”‚
â”‚  â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ tel: {                           â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   type: String,                  â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   required: [true, 'Add tel']    â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ }                                â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚
â”‚                                        â”‚
â”‚  AFTER (Enhanced for OAuth)            â”‚
â”‚  â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ tel: {                           â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   type: String,                  â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   required: function() {         â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚     return !this.googleId;       â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   }                              â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ },                               â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ googleId: {  // NEW              â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   type: String,                  â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   unique: true,                  â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚   sparse: true                   â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ }                                â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚
â”‚                                        â”‚
â”‚  Key Changes:                          â”‚
â”‚  âœ… tel: Conditionally required        â”‚
â”‚  âœ… googleId: Added for OAuth          â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```
